title: (x) ST GEORGE lettering in subway - Toronto Subway {Dav}
content:
I'm wondering about the bigger one.

Thankyou.

Here is the link.  
 [http://flickr.com/photos/joeclark/12543363/in/pool-anti-arial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023152357/http:/flickr.com/photos/joeclark/12543363/in/pool-anti-arial/ "http://flickr.com/photos/joeclark/12543363/in/pool-anti-arial/")
author: Chris Washer

comments.content:
Toronto Subway is \*a version\* of the indigenous TTC typeface. The TTC believes it has its own outline-font version. I have a few reservations about Toronto Subway; we may need a few more iterations before we arrive at a really accurate outline-font version, particularly given the fact that there is no model for the lower case.

—  
Joe Clark  
 [http://joeclark.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023152357/http:/joeclark.org/ "http://joeclark.org/")
